name: 100% off by Pinkatomic Games (NachoPepe)
description:
Made for the Game Jobs Live Game Jam!!

 Returning any item to the checkout increases the score by the normal price of the item. Get as many items as you can while the sale is on!! Use the cart to load up on items far away from the checkout.
